New Records: Matt Olson tied Andruw Jones' single-season Braves record with his 51st homer
The Braves are tied for most players with 35 homers in a season on one team in MLB history
Key Match Events: Spencer Strider won his 17th game of the season
Austin Riley hit a two-run homer in the first inning
Kirby Yates earned his fifth save
Riley had a sacrifice fly in the third and Kevin Pillar added an RBI double in the fourth
Pre-Game Insights: The Braves had a magic number of two going into Wednesday night
Matt Olson was fresh off his 51st homer Tuesday night
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Brian Snitker said 'We've checked one box'
The Braves were met with sparkling wine and beer in the visitors' clubhouse of Citizens Bank Park after the game
Sean Murphy said it was a 'pretty sweet' win, especially since it was on the same field where the Braves were eliminated last year
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves currently lead the MLB in wins
The Braves are on pace to finish with 106 wins, which would tie the 1998 Braves for the most wins in the franchise's nearly 150-year history
The Braves have seemingly made winning the East a rite of September since the 1990s
The Braves won 28 of 33 games between May 31 to July 8 to build a 9 1/2-game lead
